  • Method Details

    • createFeedingSchedule

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createFeedingSchedule(@RequestBody FeedingScheduleDto feedingScheduleDto)
      Creates a new feeding schedule based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      feedingScheduleDto - The DTO containing the details of the feeding schedule to be created.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message if the feeding schedule is created successfully, ResponseEntity with a bad request status and relevant error message if there's an illegal argument, ResponseEntity with an internal server error status and generic error message for other exceptions.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If there's an error in the provided feeding schedule details.

    • getFeedingSchedule

      @GetMapping("/{horseId}") public FeedingScheduleDto getFeedingSchedule(@PathVariable Long horseId)
      Retrieves the feeding schedule for the specified horse.
      Parameters:
      horseId - the ID of the horse.
      Returns:
      the feeding schedule of the horse.

    • deleteFeedingSchedule

      @DeleteMapping("/{horseId}") public void deleteFeedingSchedule(@PathVariable Long horseId)
      Deletes the feeding schedule for the specified horse.
      Parameters:
      horseId - the ID of the horse.

    • modifyFeedingSchedule

      @PutMapping("/{horseId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> modifyFeedingSchedule(@PathVariable Long horseId, @RequestBody FeedingScheduleDto feedingScheduleDTO)
      Modifies the feeding schedule for the specified horse.
      Parameters:
      horseId - the ID of the horse.
      feedingScheduleDTO - the updated feeding schedule data.

    • getEligibleHorses

      @GetMapping("/eligible-horses") public List<HorseDto> getEligibleHorses(@RequestParam(required=false) LocalTime time)
      Retrieves a list of horses eligible for feeding at the specified time.

      If no time is provided in the request parameters, the current system time is used as the default. This method fetches horses that are eligible for feeding based on the provided or default time.

      Parameters:
      time - An optional LocalTime parameter representing the time to check the eligibility. If not provided, the current system time is used.
      Returns:
      A list of HorseDto representing the eligible horses for feeding.
